author: Max Moeller
title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons Is Exactly What We Need to Fight Coronavirus Despair
description: Animal Crossing: New Horizons is exactly what we need to fight the despair and loneliness of our seemingly-endless coronavirus quarantines. The post Animal Crossing: New Horizons Is Exactly What We Need to Fight Coronavirus Despair appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Animal Crossing: New Horizons launched during a particularly tough time.
  • It has already broken sales records in multiple countries.
  • This is the game to get us through social distancing.
